Description:
Hands on experience on Cisco Routers and Switches.
Through knowledge in routing protocols like BGP, OSPF & cisco switching technology.
Hands on experience & through knowledge on Cisco NAC, Cisco Any connect VPN
Hands on experience on Cisco Stealthwatch, ManageEngine.
Hands on experience & through knowledge  on Cisco FTD Firewall/IPS, Palo Alto Firewall/IPS.
Hands on experience & through knowledge  on F5 Web Application firewall and NLB
Working knowledge on Microsoft CASB, Microsegmention, SDWAN, DNS Security
Knowledge on CIS, PCI-DSS controls.
CCIE, CISSP, CISM certifications will be a plus.Job Details
